articles.title: What's next for Anfield after Liverpool make millions from Eagles, Elton John and Rolling Stones concerts - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Anfield played host to three music legends this summer
articles.content:
The Eagles brought a close to Anfield's musical offerings on Monday night as Don Henley, Joe Walsh and the crew delivered a masterclass in Liverpool.
